document.docAuthor: Petrescu, Iorgu, Chatterjee, Tapas & Schizas, Nikolaos V.
document.masterDocTitle: New species and new records of Cumacea (Crustacea: Peracarida: Cumacea) from mesophotic reefs of Puerto Rico and U. S. Virgin Islands, Caribbean Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and new records of Cumacea (Crustacea: Peracarida: Cumacea) from mesophotic reefs of Puerto Rico and U. S. Virgin Islands, Caribbean Sea

heading.emphasis:
Key to subgenus
Cumella
from western tropical Atlantic

paragraph.keyLead: - Uropodal peduncle as long as or shorter than last pleonite..................................................... 19
- Carapace without dorsal denticles on ocular lobe............................................................. 6

4. Carapace with 12 dorsal denticles.................................................
spinifera Petrescu, Heard, 2004

5. Carapace with 8 denticles...........................................
achimae Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2013

6. Carapace with 18 dorsal denticles on carapace.............................................
ruetzleri Petrescu, 2002

7. Carapace with 8 dorsal denticles.......................................
pagani Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2014

8. Carapace with 6 dorsal denticles........................................

9. Carapace with less than 6 denticles................................
alexandrinae Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2012

11. Pereopod 2 dactylus with 4 subterminal setae..........................
manolelii Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2013

- Pereopod 2 dactylus with 2 subterminal setae...............................................
tourmalinae
sp. nov.

12. Carapace with 2 dorsal denticles........................................
gurui Petrescu, Chatterjee & Schizas, 2013

longiseta

hexadentata
